name: Venus & Braves: Majo no Megami to Horobi no Yogen
synopsis: The sequel to Namco's Japanese-only PS2 RPG [[Seven: Molmorth no Kiheitai|Seven: The Calvary of Molmoth]], Venus & Braves tells the story of Blood Boal; a legendary solider who has been resurrected in the year 999 and granted immortality by the goddess Ariah. Charged with a mission to lead his army of 14 soldiers against an evil invading armada of monsters, Blood must prevent the apocalypse before it's too late. Gameplay features include a strategy-oriented battle system, a solider creation mechanic that allows players to customize their grunts, and online head-to-head play.
